dateOnWatchSidebarItems: Show publish date on watch "Up next" section
useWebV2HomeEndpoint: Do not use shelves on homepage
versionInFooter: Show Rehike version in the footer
useReturnYouTubeDislike: Use the Return YouTube Dislike API to show dislike counts
byTextOnByline: Show "by" before the author's name on video links
noViewsText: Show the view count on watch without "views" after it
movingThumbnails: Show a preview of videos on hover
guideOnWatchPage: Allow guide pinning on the watch page
hhCSSFixes: Hitchhiker CSS fixes (May conflict with custom themes!)
accountPickerYtStudio: Link to YouTube Studio instead of Creator Studio in the account picker
